creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Long panel of soft brick-red velvet with an all-over design of bats and lotus sprays in pale greenish-tan.  Border of running  floral and leaf design in brick-red on a blue ground.  One side border has been cut down to half its normal width.  Some tears in border.  Lining of thin blue silk.
title: Panel
